content: when the temperature drops reach for this classically-designed knit turtleneck for a wonderful fit and cozy warmth this knit raglan sweater is worked in the round from the top down which means there are no seams required the stocking stitch body shows off the marled effect of our self-striping caron marble cakes yarn two-by-two twisted rib cuffs hem and turtleneck add subtle texture to complete the look in any color that suits your style it s sure to become a wardrobe favorite that you ll want to flaunt every day materials sizes u s 7 4 5 mm and u s 8 5 mm circular knitting needles 16 40 5 cm and 36 91 5 cm long sets of 4 sizes u s 7 4 5 mm and u s 8 5 mm double-pointed knitting needles
